verbose_text: A prospective observational study by Rubeiz et al on 381 acutely ill patients showed that, although hypomagnesemic and normomagnesemic patients had comparable APACHE II scores and did not differ with regard to other clinically relevant variables, patients with hypomagnesemia in the ICU and in the wards had mortality approximately twice as high compared to patients with normal Mg levels (P < 0.01) [XREF_BIBR].
